message: We Need A Good looking & Good working Islamic App, which support Multi-platform & Open sourced :)

data.message: Do you have ideas :)
I can be in Charge of Design & Front End :)
And I can Code it ISA, But we need the seed :)
And I have one :)

It can be a directory of all the Islamic centers in the whole world ex: when i came here to mexico I was searching for a Mosque and i had some difficulties finding it! i guess this application should be in many languages
Great, I kow somebody can pay for host and domain
I can code in php and c#
we can use Geolocation APIs in modern browser to detect vistor location and list islamic centers by distance :)
Actually I was thinking that it can be  good chance to learn Ruby on Rails :) I can take care of HTML5, CSS3 and iPhone Web App using HTML5 and CSS3 :)
No proplem, Tomorrow isA i will start to learn RoR :)
I will send to the guy who will give us the host and the domain, What do you  think ?
I have the hosting server and i have no problem paying for the domain :)
the hosting company is http://www.hostgator.com
Awesome, Tomorrow i will send you a MySQL database to discus isA
Perfect we can have a Skype meeting :) my skype is: Mohammed.Alaa
Now I am going to download RoR :)
OK, i will get one and add you isA
try not to use Windows :) it work best on Linux and MAC http://rubyonrails.org/screencasts this can help you :)
http://tryruby.org/
I get one for windows tring to explore it now http://code.google.com/p/rubydotnetcompiler/downloads/list

Project X30
Requirements:
1- Cross browser, os, and device.
2- Support Multilanguage.
3- Auto detects visitor location and language.
4- Allow visitors to add Islamic organizations.
5- I don’t know how, But if we can link it to social networks it will be cool.
6- Additional service that we can add is prayer times.
7- Show the nearest Islamic places in the first page.
8- Allow visitors to search by name, keyword or by area
9- View Title,Discription,map and URL if exist.
I think starting with the requirments is best way :)
"Project X30" is the project code or code name :)
Add to the specification Facebook group or Page, Twitter etc.. :)
